root.name: Weird Worlds: Return to Infinite Space
root.description: OverviewWeird Worlds: Return to Infinite Space is a space exploration game that is set in the distant future in a distant galaxy, it is the sequel to Strange adventures in Infinite Space.When the player is exploration mode the game is turned base, once the player enters combat the game play is real time.Features35 usable weapons.103 ship upgrades.a doomsday weapon.7 unique alien races.3 different missions.a single click interface.localized damaged.
